Title: Dragon Noble
Intro: A Dragon Noble is armed with one of the following weapon options: Star Blade; Star Lance; Enchanted Polearm; or Star Blade and Phoenix Banner.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit can have an Aelven Purebreed mount that is armed with Ithilmar-shod Hooves. If this unit has an Aelven Purebreed mount, it has a Move characteristic of 12" instead of 6".

Rules.Name: Enchanted Shield
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES You can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit.

Rules.Name: Star Lance
Rules.Rule: If this unit is armed with a Star Lance and it makes a charge move, until the end of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with its Star Lance and add 1 to the damage inflicted by each successful attack made with its Star Lance.

Rules.Name: Phoenix Banner
Rules.Rule: If this unit is armed with a Phoenix Banner, it gains the TOTEM keyword and you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly ORDER DRACONIS units within 16" of this unit.

Rules.Name: Might Of The Dragon
Rules.Rule: Might of the Dragon: Once per battle, in the combat phase, you can say that this unit will inspire members of its order. If you do so, pick this unit and 1 other friendly ORDER DRACONIS unit within 10" of this unit. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by those units until the end of that phase.
